comment: Booked a trip to NYC with yourselves . Came to fill out the API on the aireline site to find the flight was hand luggage only but the booking clearly states checked baggage . Called cust services last Mon , told I should have a response in hrs . Still no response
amr:
# ::snt Booked a trip to NYC with yourselves . Came to fill out the API on the aireline site to find the flight was hand luggage only but the booking clearly states checked baggage . Called cust services last Mon , told I should have a response in hrs . Still no response
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (b / book-03
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (t / trip-03
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (c / city
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "NYC"))
                  :accompanier y))
      :snt2 (c2 / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (c3 / come-01
                  :ARG1 (ii / i)
                  :purpose (f / fill-out-03
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 (w / website
                              :mod (o / online))
                        :ARG2 (f2 / find-01
                              :ARG0 ii
                              :ARG1 (f3 / fly-01
                                    :mod (h / hand)
                                    :mod (o2 / only)))))
            :ARG2 (s / state-01
                  :ARG0 (b2 / book-03)
                  :ARG1 (b3 / baggage
                        :ARG1-of (c4 / check-01))
                  :ARG1-of (c5 / clear-06)))
      :snt3 (a / and
            :op1 (c6 / call-02
                  :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
                  :ARG1 (s2 / service
                        :mod (c7 / company
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Customs")))
                  :time (d / date-entity
                        :month 1
                        :mod (l / last)))
            :op2 (t2 / tell-01
                  :ARG1 (r / recommend-01
                        :ARG1 (r2 / respond-01
                              :ARG0 ii2
                              :time (a2 / after
                                    :op1 (n3 / now)
                                    :quant (m2 / multiple
                                          :op1 (t3 / temporal-quantity
                                                :quant 1
                                                :unit (h2 / hour)))))
                        :ARG2 ii2))
            :snt4 r2
            :polarity -
            :mod (s3 / still)))
